eng:

Call of Duty Big Red One puts us in the skin of a single soldier, unlike its previous version where the character and changed sides according to phases. Now belong to the first division of the U.S. Infantry, known as The Big Red One division was famous for its wealth of historical missions which were from North Africa, from landing in France Normandy and other countries such as Italy and reaching the final surrender to Nazi Germany. On this occasion, as we said before, we are a single character throughout the game, but the immersion has been achieved far surpasses his previous game, as Big Red One will go to many NPC's that will be our friends for several missions in a distributed-level timing of 3 years and to be shared with the fun and exciting talks will held in the kinematics with the engine of the game. 

As in any war, the nonsense, realistic and cruel fate that we will see later how to survive ambushes and battles hard, we will lose the life, no more, and in situations that represent less risk. We had tried to portray the harshness of the war in full swing, with changing situations in 1 second and when everything seemed calm, giving the successful lives of our comrades who have been in good times and bad. Big Red One is presented as a more realistic view of war that we saw in our consoles. He reached the end?
